#summary &longleftarrow; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &longleftarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&LongLeftArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f5/index.htm U+027F5].
  * `&Longleftarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f8/index.htm U+027F8].
  * `&longleftarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f5/index.htm U+027F5].
